website_summaries.verdict: Interesting dual shaker bottle design that allows you to keep different drinks on either side of the bottle.
pros: Allows you to place a pre-workout shake in one half of the bottle and a post-workout shake in the other half, so you only have to carry one bottle
Each half of the lid has its own cap and spout to make the bottle easy to use
cons: Each side of the bottle only can hold a maximum of 14 oz

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups for pre and post. My old ones finally bit the dust after a few years (the lids crack). I got this one, but the lid is super difficult to snap on and the cap is also difficult to close and open. Also, the gasket that divides the two compartments falls out a lot. My other gripe is that the caps used to be two different colors so you can quickly determine which side is which. When they are both black, and now there is print on both sides, it's easy to confuse the two.
customer_reviews.author: elle83

customer_reviews.title: I chose to buy it mainly because it was made in the USA and I liked the color and message on it
customer_reviews.text: I found my self skeptical about this cup and it's two chambered design. I chose to buy it mainly because it was made in the USA and I liked the color and message on it. After using it for a couple of weeks I have ordered a second. It has worked perfectly for me as I drink one chamber early and one late in the day. When I reach a level of fitness where I need to push more it can be used for a pre workout and post workout drink. Definitely recommend this to anyone who is using whey or smoothies in their diet. Also pretty easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ezra Cerio

customer_reviews.title: It does what its suppose to do , 2 mixes at the same time!!
customer_reviews.text: After having so many cups , decided to throw them all away and go with this one. Very convenient and easy to shake my pre-workout and during workout supplement at the same time. The only issue I have is the rubber seal on the cap comes off and I have to align it Everytime.
customer_reviews.author: adolfo

customer_reviews.title: I Broke It...Again
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bottle, but it is not durable at all. This was my second one (out of 2) to break within the first couple of weeks. The little plastic hinges that hold the lid on snap off very easily. If they would improve the hinge durability, I would order another in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea for Indecisiveness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter since she can never decide what she wants to drink. One side could be fruit punch the other lemonade. They work well, shake up great and the two flavors don't mix with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle ever
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is better than I originally thought. It is very durable for us clumsy folks and super easy to clean as long as you clean it like you should there shouldn't be issues. I also love the quote and dual sides.
customer_reviews.author: K.E.Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. My son talked me into giving it to him,so I ordered another's one in pink. Love them both
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: it smelled like rotten egg from inside
customer_reviews.text: Being a plastic, hard time cleaning up. After about a month, despite washing it thoroughly, it smelled like rotten egg from inside. It's always better to buy shaker made of glass
